features: Pay Attention: 1. Please move your car seat back 1-2inches than your daily drive when you use our lumbar pillow in your cars. 2. You can adjust the chair pillow to the higher place to get more support on your back.

✔USPTO PATENTED MULTI-REGION BACK SUPPORT: Package Included: 1 Pack Lumbar support pillow. The orthopedic design and curved structure of Teemour Lumbar Support Cushion provide comfort and the proper support for your lower, mid, & upper back support to jointly keep your back and spine in ideal posture, reducing back pain on your back muscles while you are working or driving. with this chair back support, you will have a great time wherever you are.

✔INSTANT LUMBAR SUPPOT PILLOW:Teemour car pillow are made of High density, thick, durable, high grade memory foam which will not become soft or hard according to the temperature. Therefore, the chair cushion for back pain can provide firm comfy support all the time and never become flat as time passes during the day. Also, the quality memory foam inside absorbs shock during driving and perfectly fits the human spine curve and offers cushion & comfort to your waist no matter you sit or drive.

✔THREE ADJUSTABLE STRAPS: Teemmour lumbar support pillow for car is designed with 3 adjustable strapes for stable installation and prevent from sliding around during use. With the long straps, it is suitable for large and small chairs and it works on extra-large seats as well.

✔ BREATHABLE 4D MESH COVER: Our Teemour chair pillow features 4D air-cool mesh cover which is highly breathable for comfortable touch and promotes airflow. This minimizes sweat and moisture build up. Besides, you can remove this lumbar pillow cover and machine wash it to keep your car seat cushions for driving looking and smelling fresh. (Tips:only the cover can be washed. Please do not wash the memory foam.)
✔ENJOY BACK PAIN RELIEF: With this car cushions,you can enjoy better back support & maximum back pain relief for your office computer chair, car or airplane seats, bed, sofa & couch.

✔MONEY BACK GUARANTEE- We are confident in our back pillow and we offer a 30-day return/replacement service. Please contact us via amazon if you have any quality related questions about our lumbar pillow.We will try our best to make you satisfied.

🎁Perfect Gifts for Your Family and Friends-Our back support pillow will be perfect gifts for your family and friends as Christmas Gifts, Valentine's Day Gifts, Mother's Day Gifts, Birthday Gifts, Father's Day Gifts, etc. You will have a nice day with our lumbar pillow. This back support cushion will be best gifts for women men dad mom husband wife and any loved ones to enjoy every day. Christmas gifts for women men mom dad.
🎁Best office gifts, bus driver gifts, trucker gifts, truck driver gifts, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Teemour Lumbar Pillow Makes Your Life More Comfortable and Healthy! The orthopedic design and curved structure of Teemour Lumbar Support Cushion provide comfort and the proper support for your lower, mid, & upper back support to jointly keep your back and spine in ideal posture, reducing back pain on your back muscles while you are working or driving.

Teemour Lumbar Pillow is Bigger Than Others. Are you spending a lot of time sitting on office chair or car seat? With our back cushion, you will reduce pain on your lumbar and back. It will keep you comfortable all day.

Premium Memory Foam, Breathable Mesh Cover, Three Adjustable Straps Design Previous page Next page Teemour lumbar pillow is made of premium memory foam which can provide you good support for your lumbar and your lower back. It can last for a long time and neve become flat. The 4D mesh cover is durable and breathable. Designed with 3 straps, the lumbar cushion will stay in place withtout moving.
Previous page Fits All Chair Types It’s suitable for most kinds of chair such as office chair, gaming chair, car, truck, couch. Next page 1 ANYWHERE 2 CAR SEAT 3 OFFICE CHAIR 4 AT HOME 5 TRUCK
Suitable for All People Who Always Spend A Lot of Time Sitting Our chair pillow is great for you when you are driving, working, traveling, or just reaxing at home.

This Lumbar Support Pillow Will be A Perfect Gift for Your Family and Friends. Our back support pillow is a perfect Christmas gift, Mother's Day gift, Father's Day gift, Valentine's Day Gifts, birthday gift for your friends and families. With our lumbar pillow, you will be comfortable all day.

Warm Tips about how to use the lumbar support pillow. 1)Please move your car seat back 1-2inches than your daily drive when you use our lumbar pillow in your cars to prevent from pushing your forward. 2)You can adjust the chair pillow to the higher place to get more support on your back. How thick is the lumbar cushion? The thickest part, the part that curves into the lumbar, is about 3"-4". Please check it before you buy. Where it can be used for? It’s great for all kinds of chairs. You can use it in your office chair, truck, computer chair, car or airplane seats, bed, sofa & couch. How long is the strap? Will it fit around my car seat? The straps of the lumba cushion are long and adjustable. It will fit about all kinds of chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good lumbar support for GOLF CART
reviews.reviewText: Have these ever made a difference on2006 golf cart Club Car. We are very pleased with the new comfort. Highly recommend .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and thick!
reviews.reviewText: It is perfect for me- it may be too thick for you- be sure to check dimensions.It’s high quality and nice and firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be well made and pretty comfy. Used it for a 1300 mile road trip down the east coast. Just note that this will change your seating position and you will be closer to the steering wheel so you will have to readjust the seat. Also, if your seat has side bolsters this will kinda make them useless, it effectively filled in the space between the bolsters and made my seat flat with no side support. Hope that makes sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solves the problem in my VW GTI of uncomfortable seat shape!
reviews.reviewText: My back isn't curvy I guess because my VW seats are shaped weird so this fills in perfectly and now I drive comfortably all the time. Very happy with this - it's flexible to conform to my body but also stays put so I never have to adjust it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, firm support.
reviews.reviewText: This cushion molds perfectly to my back and maintains support throughout the day. I drive about 14 hours a day and have enjoyed the comfort and support this cushion provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Too big for me but nicely made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s tall enough and has three elastic straps that hold
reviews.reviewText: The three elastic straps keep in the position you put it in it’s great coverage for lower mid and upper back . I originally ordered it and another one but the other had a seat and back portion which I could not use as it was to cramped but this one has a lot of cushion for your back and the price of this one was way under half of the other you can’t go wrong with this long rides on hot days feel much better then having my back up against the seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be working
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be working. Definitely helping. Super easy to use (just threw one fastening belt behind the headrest).

Meine Mutter hat das Kissen in ihrem Sessel, weil sie sich sonst nicht an die Rückenlehne anlehnen könnte. Mit dieser Rückenstütze kann sie gut und bequem sitzen. Nach nunmehr 4 Wochen Dauergebrauch hat sich Nichts verformt oder platt gedrückt. Dank der Gummis bleibt das Kissen dort wo man es platziert. Allerdings waren die Gummis für einen Polstersessel zu kurz, sie ließen sich aber leicht mit einem Stück extra Gummi verlängern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my sim racing seat. I managed 6 hours with no back pain. Normally after 2 hours of racing my back feeling it. I got this for £15 as a return and its an absolute bargain. Id be happy to pay full price for this.

Das Produkt ist zufriedenstellend , passt gut auf den Stuhl , bloß unten könnte es etwas länger sein damit es mit den Stuhl perfekt abschließt . Ansonsten ist das Kissen sehr bequem ,tut meinen Rücken gut. Bin soweit zufrieden .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Anything that helps and aids a sore back is money well spent

Das Teemour Rückenkissen kommt vakuumiert und sollte sich erst mal zwei Tage lang entfalten.Ich konnte beim Auspacken keinen unangenehmen Geruch feststellen.Das Kissen verfügt über drei elastische Gurte zum Festschnallen am Bürostuhl, Autositz usw.Der Bezug lässt sich abnehmen und bei 30 Grad waschen. Das Material des Bezugs ist Meshgewebe und die Füllung ist Memory Schaum. aAuf der Rückseite des Bezugs sind Anti-Rutsch-Noppen.Ich nutze das Kissen sowohl auf dem Sofa, auf meinem Schreibtischstuhl und im Sessel.Deswegen nutze ich auch die Gurte nicht, ich nehme es immer dahin mit wo ich gerade sitze...Eigentlich wollte ich das Kissen auf meinem Stuhl auf der Arbeit nutzen, da ich von dem Stuhl immer noch zusätzliche Rückenschmerzen bekomme. Da ich aber einen Arbeitsplatz habe an dem sehr viel Schmutz entsteht, ist mir das Kissen jetzt zu schade dafür und ich nutze es lieber zu Hause.Mir persönlich hilft das Kissen bei akuten Schmerzen und auch dabei eine richtige Sitzposition einzunehmen.Ich finde es sehr bequem auch bei längerem Gebrauch.Es passt sich optimal an und unterstützt ohne das es unangenehm wird.Grade wenn sich mal wieder ein Hexenschuss anbahnt, bin ich froh das ich dieses Kissen habe.Ich weiß nicht warum, aber sobald ich es dann im Rücken habe lässt der Schmerz nach. Klar vollbringt das Kissen keine Wunder und ich brauche trotzdem noch ein Schmerzmittel, aber es tut echt gut für eine halbe Stunde Schmerzfrei zu sitzen und zu warten bis das Schmerzmittel wirkt.Das ist aber alles nur mein subjektives Empfinden und jeder muss für sich austesten was ihm wie am besten hilft.Für mich ist das Kissen echt super, ich bin froh das ich es habe und würde es auch anderen empfehlen.
